content:
This code chunk sets up the visual properties for the top black bar element used in the letterbox effect within a graphical user interface. The properties include frame color, border width, size, position, image details, scale, offset, and sort order, which define how the top bar appears on the screen during transitions or aspect ratio adjustments in an application.

frameColor = (0, 0, 0, 1),
                borderWidth = (0, 0),
                frameSize = (-1, 1, 0, 0.2),
                pos = (0, 0, -1.2),
                image = barImage,
                image_scale = (2.25,1,.5),
                image_pos = (0,0,.1),
                image_color = (0.3,0.3,0.3,1),
                sortOrder = 0,
            )
